data.title: Victims of Palestinian Violence and Terrorism Since September 2000
data.meta_description: Victims of Palestinian Violence and Terrorism since September 2000 - Free download as Word Doc (.doc / .docx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. 1,154 people have been killed by Palestinian violence and terrorism since September 2000. Between September 2000 and May 2006, 7,844 casualties were treated, including 642 killed and over 7,000 injured. This list of victims includes those killed in terror attacks both in Israel and abroad. Many were killed in shooting attacks, bombings, or suicide bombings carried out by Palestinian militants.
data.text: Victims of Palestinian Violence and Terrorism Since September 2000
